items.item: Environmental testing sensor components (wind, light, temp)
Test solar-battery system to validate renewable charging rate

contractors.name: Robust Boats Ltd
contractors.role: Specialist vessel integration/retrofit expertise (WP3/WP7) 10 days throughout project at 300/day for technical input on vessel mechanical and electrical design, regulations, certifications and market scoping

contractors.name: Oxalis Design Ltd
contractors.role: Specialist design/simulation support to validate feasibility of retrofit electrified power system including regulatory compliance review (WP3/WP4) 16 days throughout project at 250/day.

trips.purpose: Transport for Project Meetings/Site Visits for 2x PEBL staff members to visit project partners (160-miles return swansea - st. davids at 0.45p/mile)
